title: No champs are showing up on my game! Can't pick any champ
body: I opened league just a few minutes ago and noticed that in the champions tab on the client. i could not see any free rotation and owned champions. tried to use practice tool to check, and saw that i couldn't pick any champs on champ select. restarted league and tried to download again but still nothing. how to fix?

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
